item.title: Bispecific Antibody Improves PFS in EGFR-Mutated Lung Cancer
item.description: The HARMONi trial showed ivonescimab plus chemotherapy reduced disease progression risk by 48% in patients with EGFR-mutated NSCLC after TKI failure. ...

item.title: Fertility Clinics Must End Unproven Treatments, Says NICE
item.description: NICE expands NHS fertility preservation services, clarifies who should be offered IVF treatment, and warns against using unproven ‘add-on’ treatments....

item.title: Pretzel-Shaped Chemo System Approved for CIS Bladder Cancer
item.description: Johnson & Johnson says approval of the Inlexzo system may help more people keep their bladder. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Polyomavirus Antibody Test Predicts Merkel Cell Recurrence

item.title: Is Contrast-Free MRI the Optimal Test for PC?
item.description: A new study finds biparametric MRI fared no worse than standard imaging at identifying prostate cancers, while avoiding risks from contrast injections...
